long_description: The new and improved Clif Shot energy gel features more electrolytes and a thinner consistency to help you get energized between breaths. Electrolytes such as sodium and potassium are essential in metabolizing carbohydrates and for the proper functioning of muscles. New thin consistency goes down quickly and easily. Made with all natural and organic ingredients-no artificial colors, flavors, sweeteners or preservatives. Chocolate, Vanilla, and Razz flavors are caffeine free; Strawberry flavor contains 25mg of caffeine; Mocha flavor contains 50mg. Double Expresso Turbo and Chocolate Cherry Turbo flavors contain 100mg of caffeine each. Double Expresso Turbo and Chocolate Cherry Turbo flavors use at least 85% organic ingredients; other flavors use at least 90% organic ingredients. Each Clif Shot energy gel packet features a Litter Leash(R) that allows the tear tab to stay attached to the bottom of the packet after use. Simply squeeze into your mouth and follow with a swig of water. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The new and improved Clif Shot energy gel features more electrolytes and a thinner consistency to help you get energized between breaths.
